markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Powerful Leap](/Feats.aspx?ID=820) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 264 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

When you Leap, you can jump 5 feet up with a vertical Leap, and you increase the distance you can jump horizontally by 5 feet.
name: Powerful Leap

<additional-info>

<summary>
Jump farther and higher.
</summary>
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 2" pfs="Standard" > Powerful Leap Source Core Rulebook pg. 264 4.0 Prerequisites Expert in Athletics --- When you Leap, you can jump 5 feet up with a vertical Leap, and you increase the distance you can jump horizontally by 5 feet.
